text: W e are pleased to announce that AABA, one of the country's oldest eating disorders advocacy organizations, and EDAP, the country's largest, have joined together to form the National Eating Disorders Association! This merger represents an important and exciting marker in the history of the eating disorders field and will create new opportunities for enhancing educational programming, prevention efforts, research, advocacy, treatment, and outreach throughout the United States and beyond.
title: The National Eating Disorders Splash Page
